  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_103085</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_103085</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Magnetic field of a current-carrying wire: without current</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetisch fangen Sie von einer 
aktuell-tragenden Leitung auf: ohne Strom</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Champ magnétique d'un fil actuel-portant : 
sans courant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Campo magnético de um fio atual-carregando: 
sem corrente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Campo magnetico di un legare corrente-trasportante:
senza corrente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγνητικό πεδίο ενός παρών-φέρνοντας καλωδίου: 
χωρίς ρεύμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Campo magnético de un alambre actual-que lleva: 
sin corriente</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">First of three diagrams on observing magnetic fields of a straight wire. This diagram shows four compasses around a wire pointing in the same direction when the switch is off.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current-carrying wire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">direct current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">direct current voltage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">switch</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von drei Diagrammen auf dem Beobachten 
magnetisch fängt von einer geraden Leitung auf. Dieses
Diagramm zeigt vier Kompassse um eine Leitung, die in der gleichen 
Richtung zeigt, wenn der Schalter aus ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">D'abord de trois diagrammes sur observer les 
champs magnétiques d'un fil droit. Ce diagramme montre quatre 
boussoles autour d'un fil se dirigeant dans la même direction quand 
le commutateur est éteint.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de três diagramas em observar 
campos magnéticos de um fio reto. Este diagrama mostra quatro 
compassos em torno de um fio que aponta no mesmo sentido quando o 
interruptor está desligada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di tre schemi sull'osservazione dei
campi magnetici di un legare diritto. Questo schema mostra 
quattro bussole intorno ad un legare che indica nello stesso senso 
quando l'interruttore è disinserito.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα τριών διαγραμμάτων στην παρατήρηση των 
μαγνητικών πεδίων ενός ευθέος καλωδίου. Αυτό το διάγραμμα
εμφανίζει τέσσερις πυξίδες γύρω από ένα καλώδιο που δείχνουν 
στην ίδια κατεύθυνση πότε ο διακόπτης είναι κλειστός.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de tres diagramas en la observación de 
campos magnéticos de un alambre recto. Este diagrama muestra 
cuatro compases alrededor de un alambre que señala en la misma 
dirección cuando el interruptor está apagado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kompaß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">aktuell-tragende Leitung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichstrom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichstromspannung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schalten Sie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">boussole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fil actuel-portant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">courant continu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tension de courant continu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">commutateur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fio atual-carregando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">corrente direta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tensão da corrente direta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">interruptor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">bussola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legare corrente-trasportante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">corrente continua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">interruttore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πυξίδα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρών-φέρνοντας καλώδιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
